publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3280 Brian Adam: Northern Isles-Aberdeen-Rosyth-Zeebrugge Ferry Link-That the Parliament welcomes the successful introduction of the Rosyth-Zeebrugge ferry; notes that it hopes to serve all of Scotland as a maritime link to Europe, and calls on the Scottish Executive to investigate the extension of the northern isles ferry routes from the islands to Aberdeen and then to Rosyth to enhance access for the north and north east of Scotland to important business and tourism markets in Europe.

S1M-3280 Northern Isles-Aberdeen-Rosyth-Zeebrugge Ferry Link (lodged on 16 July 2002) Ms Sandra White*, Bruce Crawford*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Christine Grahame*, Nora Radcliffe*, Alex Neil*, Linda Fabiani*, Tricia Marwick*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*
S1M-3280 Northern Isles-Aberdeen-Rosyth-Zeebrugge Ferry Link (lodged on 16 July 2002) Robin Harper*
S1M-3280 Northern Isles-Aberdeen-Rosyth-Zeebrugge Ferry Link (lodged on 16 July 2002) Richard Lochhead*
S1M-3280 Northern Isles-Aberdeen-Rosyth-Zeebrugge Ferry Link (lodged on 16 July 2002) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-3280 Northern Isles-Aberdeen-Rosyth-Zeebrugge Ferry Link (lodged on 16 July 2002) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-3280 Northern Isles-Aberdeen-Rosyth-Zeebrugge Ferry Link (lodged on 16 July 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*
